body: My name is Voyager, I was introduced to this server by my best friend CrafterPete1013! I've been playing on this server for a while and was just now introduced to the forums. I play a lot of nebula and walls and I cant wait to get to know each and everyone of you!

title: My Introduction

replies.body: Welcome to the server! Feel free to ask the staff if you have any questions. I can't wait to play a few games with ya d:
